Question
========

Every morning, Daan rolls a clean die. If he throws a 1 or 2 then he goes to play soccer. If he throws a 3, 4, 5 or 6 then he goes running. What is the probability that out of the next five days he will run exactly two will be running?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,111
* 0,400
* 0,165
* 0,329
* 0,671

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0,111: Incorrect
* 0,400: Incorrect
* 0.165: Correct
* 0.329: Incorrect
* 0.671: Incorrect
